document.heading: Equal Opportunity for Local, Small, or Disadvantaged Business Enterprises Amendment Act of 2000

history.narrative: Law 13-169, the “Equal Opportunity for Local, Small, or Disadvantaged Business Enterprises Amendment Act of 2000,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-241, which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 4, 2000, and June 6, 2000, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 26, 2000, it was assigned Act No. 13-373 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-169 became effective on October 4, 2000.
